**Tender Announcement: Common Heavy Equipment Replacement**

### Title
Common Heavy Equipment Replacement (CHER) project Bundle 6 (W8476-185840/G)

### Reference Number
WS3307083994-Doc4599119106

### Solicitation Number
WS3307083994

### Publication Date
2024-05-22

### Tender Closing Date
2024-07-31, 14:00 EDT

## Project Overview

The Common Heavy Equipment Replacement (CHER) project aims to modernize the Canadian Armed Forces' (CAF) Heavy Support Equipment (HSE) capability by replacing militarized heavy equipment with efficient, reliable, and deployable tools.

## Requirement

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the procurement of the following products:

* Telescopic Forklifts
* Light Forklifts
* Medium Forklifts
* Heavy Forklifts

## Tender Information

The tender is open for submission to all qualified suppliers. Interested parties must submit their responses and required documentation through SAP Ariba (external link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19784631](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19784631)).

### Contacts
* Benoit Guertin, Department of Public Works and Services, may be contacted for further clarification. Email: benoit.guertin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Contracting Entity
* Department of Public Works and Services, 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.
